metadata.name: Assess Code Quality Principles
metadata.shortDescription: Critical evaluation of codebase against established engineering principles (SOLID, DRY, YAGNI) with evidence-based scoring and specific improvement recommendations
metadata.description: Provides systematic evaluation of code quality against industry-standard principles including SOLID principles, DRY/YAGNI compliance, testing quality, architecture assessment, security practices, and performance patterns. Generates comprehensive quality scorecards with evidence-based grading (A-F scale), specific code examples, and prioritized improvement recommendations with effort estimates.
objectives: Evaluate codebase against SOLID principles with specific violation examples
Assess code quality metrics including DRY, YAGNI, and complexity analysis
Generate evidence-based quality scorecard with A-F grading scale
Provide prioritized improvement recommendations with effort estimates
Create baseline quality metrics for tracking improvements over time
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

templates.name: Code Quality Assessment Template
templates.description: Comprehensive quality assessment report template with scoring framework

required.name: application_name
required.description: Name of the application for file naming (kebab-case format)

required.name: code_path
required.description: Path to the codebase directory to assess

optional.name: tech_spec_path
optional.description: Path to existing technical specification for context

optional.name: focus_areas
optional.description: Specific assessment areas to focus on (defaults to all categories)

primary.description: Comprehensive quality assessment report with scorecard and recommendations

artifacts.description: Overall and category-specific grades with evidence

success_criteria: Complete codebase analysis performed with comprehensive coverage
Quality scorecard generated with evidence-based grades
Specific code examples collected for all major staging
Prioritized improvement recommendations created with effort estimates
User review completed with feedback incorporated
Assessment document created following template structure
